headline.main: PRESIDENT TO ASK ARMING OF SHIPS; MESSAGE TODAY; Congress Chiefs Indicate They Will Proceed at Once on Bill to Allow Use of Guns

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 8 -- President Roosevelt will ask Congress in a special message tomorrow to repeal or revise the Neutrality Act so that American ships, under the protection of their own guns, may increase the flow of material aid to nations resisting Axis aggression.
abstract: 2d conf; Roosevelt plans message; ship arming bills to be offered by Connally and Repr Bloom; comment by Connally and Rayburn; repeal backed by Natl Lawyers Guild; opponents conf; Taft comments; Nye derides and Austin defends Adm strategy on piecemeal legis
